wikitext.*:
The '''Younger Children of Ilúvatar''' were [[Men]], who awoke many thousands of years after the Elder Children, the [[Elves]].<ref>{{S|Men}}</ref>

In [[Nargothrond]] the Elf [[Gwindor]] rebuked [[Finduilas]] for weeping, stating that it was not fit for the [[Elder Children of Ilúvatar]] to wed the Younger.<ref>{{CH|10}}, p. 167</ref>
